about_the_game:
Gerhard Speer, a once-promising football star, is at rock bottom. Forced to hang up his boots after a career-ending injury, he’s left drowning in debt and questioning his future. His agent, Melody, is no better off—her agency is teetering on the edge of bankruptcy, and her attempts to find Gerhard sponsorship deals or modelling gigs have hit a brick wall.

But when a chance reunion with Melody’s old school friend, Femke, introduces them to a daring opportunity, everything changes. Femke, a brilliant but disgruntled cybersecurity expert, reveals the perfect target: a glitzy casino in Aruba owned by a notorious drug lord with a penchant for tax evasion and human trafficking. The mission? To hit the casino’s profits before they’re smuggled offshore to his Cayman Islands vault. The stakes? Life-changing.

“Casino Heist: Aruba” is a comedic heist Visual Novel and dating sim where your choices determine the outcome. Assemble a crew, craft the perfect plan, and navigate the thrilling world of high-stakes robbery. Will you mastermind the ultimate heist and secure a fortune? Will romance blossom amid the chaos? The future is yours to steal!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is a heist game where the characters rob a casino owner who deals in illegal drugs. 

This game is a Visual Novel and Dating Sim and dates often take place in bars where alcohol is consumed.

The game is set in a resort in Aruba, in the Caribbean, hence the characters are often shown wearing revealing swimsuits.

Given it is a dating sim, there is also lots of flirtatious language and innuendos in reference to romantic relationships and intimate sexual intercourse.
